metadata.Title: CVE-2012-6699 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The decode_search function in dhcp.c in dhcpcd 3.x allows remote DHCP servers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted response.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6699` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

dhcpcd - 3.2.3-11+deb7u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dhcpcd package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.2.3-11+deb7u1build0.14.04.1').
